title: Create an Infographic
description: A content marketer wants to turn a data-heavy blog post into a more visually engaging infographic.

tasks.description: Extract the key data points and statistics from the blog post.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the most important pieces of data to visualize.

tasks.description: Outline a narrative flow for the infographic.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a logical story for the data to follow.

tasks.description: Use a design tool to create the infographic, using charts, icons, and branded visuals.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a professional and easy-to-understand infographic.
